taskDescription:
Using set builder notation, write the set <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>C</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">C</annotation></semantics></math> of all types of cars.
detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>C</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">{</mo>
  <mi>c</mi>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mo stretchy="false">|</mo>
  </mrow>
  <mi>c</mi>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>Â </mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>is a car</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">}</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">C = \{c|c{\text{ }}{\text{is a car}}\}</annotation></semantics></math>
